name: To verify the functionality add the job title

testSteps.description: Example: {Job Title=Automation Developer, Job Description=To develop automated test scripts using selenium as the main testing tool and executing test cases, Note=Should have 4 years experience in automation testing}

children.description: Given user  is logged into OrangeHrms using valid credentials
When Go to Menu bar > Admin > Job > Job Title
And Job Titles screen should get open
And Add Job Title screen should get open
And Enter the Job Title "Automation Developer"
And Enter the Job Description "To develop automated test scripts using selenium as the main testing tool and executing test cases"
And Enter the Note "Should have 4 years experience in automation testing"
Then Job title should get added

userStory.storyName: This file contains scenarios for the Job Titles

title: To verify the functionality add the job title

values: To develop automated test scripts using selenium as the main testing tool and executing test cases
Should have 4 years experience in automation testing

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given user  is logged into OrangeHrms using valid credentials
When Go to Menu bar > Admin > Job > Job Title
And Job Titles screen should get open
And Click on Add button
And Add Job Title screen should get open
And Enter the Job Title "<Job Title>"
And Enter the Job Description "<Job Description>"
And upload the Job Specification
And Enter the Note "<Note>"
And Click on Save button
Then Job title should get added

scenarioOutline:
Given user  is logged into OrangeHrms using valid credentials
When Go to Menu bar > Admin > Job > Job Title

And Click on Save button
Then Job title should get added
